title: PartyDeterminationEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify how a calculation agent will be determined.

oneOf.title: AsSpecifiedInMasterAgreement
oneOf.description: The Calculation Agent is determined by reference to the relevant master agreement.

oneOf.title: AsSpecifiedInStandardTermsSupplement
oneOf.description: The Calculation Agent is determined by reference to the relevant standard terms supplement.

oneOf.title: Both
oneOf.description: Both parties with joined rights to be a calculation agent.

oneOf.title: ExercisingParty
oneOf.description: The party that gives notice of exercise. Per 2000 ISDA Definitions, Section 11.1. Parties, paragraph (d).

oneOf.title: NonExercisingParty
oneOf.description: The party that is given notice of exercise. Per 2000 ISDA Definitions, Section 11.1. Parties, paragraph (e).
